snippet: The Brooklyn Museum acquires a trove of Black Arts Movement works; a collector is selling off an archive of vintage photographic prints; and a colorful billboard by Allen Ruppersberg will be on display at the High Line.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Brooklyn Museum acquires trove of Black Arts Movement works; collector is selling off an archive of vintage photographic prints; and colorful billboard by Allen Ruppersberg is to go on display at the High Line.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn Museum acquires a trove of Black Arts Movement works; a collector is selling off an archive of vintage photographic prints; and a colorful billboard by Allen Ruppersberg will be on display at the High Line.

headline.seo: Black Arts Movement Works at Brooklyn Museum
headline.main: New Showcase for a Neglected Era
headline.print_headline: New Showcase For a Neglected Era
